com.google.android.exoplayer

Class SmoothFrameReleaseTimeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.SmoothFrameReleaseTimeHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Choreographer.FrameCallback, MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.FrameReleaseTimeHelper

    public class SmoothFrameReleaseTimeHelper
extends Object
implements MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.FrameReleaseTimeHelper, Choreographer.FrameCallback
    Makes a best effort to adjust frame release timestamps for a smoother visual result.

        public SmoothFrameReleaseTimeHelper(float primaryDisplayRefreshRate,
                            boolean usePrimaryDisplayVsync)
        Parameters:
        primaryDisplayRefreshRate - The refresh rate of the default display.
        usePrimaryDisplayVsync - Whether to snap to the primary display vsync. May not be suitable when rendering to secondary displays.

      • adjustReleaseTime

        public long adjustReleaseTime(long unadjustedFrameTimeUs,
                     long unadjustedReleaseTimeNs)
        Description copied from interface: MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.FrameReleaseTimeHelper
        Called to make a fine-grained adjustment to a frame release time.
        Specified by:
        adjustReleaseTime in interface MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.FrameReleaseTimeHelper
        Parameters:
        unadjustedFrameTimeUs - The frame's media presentation time, in microseconds.
        unadjustedReleaseTimeNs - The frame's unadjusted release time, in nanoseconds and in the same time base as System.nanoTime().
        Returns:
        An adjusted release time for the frame, in nanoseconds and in the same time base as System.nanoTime().
